title: Additional resources
text:
The package microtype helps improving the rendering of long text easily
Quarto is an open-source librairy that enables to create dynamic scientific documents, presentations, and websites using Markdown, LaTeX, and a variety of programming languages (including python, R, etc.).

The html presentations can then be translated into pdfs using decktape.

install node brew install node
install decktape npm install -g decktape
reveal --size=1600x1000 presentation.html presentation.pdf

title: Pôle Méca seminar series
text:
This wiki serves as a central hub for all the Pôle Méca seminar series. This series consists of weekly seminars co-organised by all labs from the Pôle Mécanique. Anyone (PhD students, postdocs and permanent faculty memebers) are welcome to present their work!
Here, you will find:

Schedule: View the upcoming seminar schedule.
Past Seminars Archive: Access previous seminar presentations and slide decks.
Registration page: Register to present your work at an upcoming seminar.
Miscellaneous: Additional information and tools to support your daily scientific activities.
